actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, DOD, Treasury.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to reduce expenditures by the Federal Government, except expenditures for national defense and national security, for the fiscal year 1981.

summary.text: Limits expenditures of the Government, other than those for national defense and security for fiscal year 1981, to an amount which is five percent less than the total of such expenditures for fiscal year 1980. Limits Government expenditures for fiscal year 1981, for compensation of officers and employees of the United States, other than those whose employment is directly related to national defense and security, to an amount which is ten percent less than such expenditures for fiscal year 1980.

titles.title: A bill to reduce expenditures by the Federal Government, except expenditures for national defense and national security, for the fiscal year 1981.
